title: 浙江数字金融科技联合会官网 ZAFT

description.zh: 基于Vue3+Vite开发，个人完成的定制化企业官网。通过Docker部署在阿里云ECS Ubuntu上。
description.en: ZAFT is a customized corporate website developed using Vue3. It features modern and responsive design, as well as a range of interactive elements to enhance the user experience. The website is built using Vue3, Vue Router, and Tailwind CSS, and deployed on Alibaba Cloud through Docker.

title: ROS机器人全覆盖路径规划 ROS Robot Path Planning

description.zh: 第八届中国高校智能机器人创意大赛主题三 竞技D，基于ROS预留的接口在动态地图中设计最优的全覆盖路径规划算法。
description.en: The 8th China University Intelligent Robot Creative Competition Theme 3 Competition D, designing optimal full-coverage path planning algorithms in dynamic maps based on ROS reserved interfaces.

title: 青乐网球微信小程序 Qingle Tennis WeChat Mini Program

description.zh: 使用Uniapp+Spring Boot+Mysql开发的商用青乐网球微信小程序，为青乐网球中心提供线上服务，包括但不限于场地预约，用户社区，在线商城，AI服务，教练绑定。
description.en: A commercial Qingle Tennis WeChat mini program developed using Uniapp+Spring Boot+MySQL, providing online services for Qingle Tennis Center, including but not limited to venue reservation, user community, online mall, AI services, and coach binding.

title: 个人博客网站 Personal Blog

description.zh: 基于Vue3+TypeScript开发的个人博客网站，展示个人作品、技术文章和项目经验。采用我最高的代码设计能力和审美。
description.en: A personal blog website developed with Vue3+TypeScript, showcasing personal works, technical articles, and project experiences. Features modern design and responsive layout.

title: 智能家居控制系统 Smart Home Control

description.zh: 基于物联网技术的智能家居控制系统，支持远程控制家电设备、环境监测和自动化场景设置。
description.en: An IoT-based smart home control system supporting remote appliance control, environmental monitoring, and automated scene settings.

title: 在线学习平台 Online Learning Platform

description.zh: 面向学生和教师的在线学习平台，提供课程管理、作业提交、在线考试和学习进度跟踪等功能。
description.en: An online learning platform for students and teachers, providing course management, assignment submission, online testing, and learning progress tracking.
